messages.messageBody:
--- In Unschooling-dotcom@y..., Dnowens@a... wrote:
> Mike, why are there lines through all your posts?
> ~Nancy

Hi, Nancy. I went back to look at a few of my posts, and I don't
undestand what you mean. Mine look like everyone else's (although
perhaps too long).

I'm going home (I'm at work) but if you'd like to give me (or e-mail
me) more details, I'd be glad to fix it tomorrow if I can.

I am using Internet Explorer 6, so it should be the latest browser
technology.

Mike
mikeebb@...
